text: Paul Holz (27 September 1952 – 11 December 2017)Ex-Bundesliga-Spieler Paul Holz gestorben was a German football midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Bundesliga players Category:2.
